vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.36;
son of: Ahaz (H0271H);
father of: Alemeth (H5964I), Azmaveth (H5820H) and Zimri (H2174H); also called Jarah at 1Ch.9.42;
Another name of ye.ho.ad.dah (יְהוֹעַדָּה "Jehoaddah" H3085)
§ Jarah = "forested"
a descendant of Saul, son of Micah, great grandson of Mephibosheth
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Ahaz; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅拉 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "樹木叢生的"
一名掃羅的後裔, 亞哈斯的兒子. 亞哈斯是米迦的兒子, 米非波設的孫子 (代上 9:42)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅拉 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "树木丛生的"
一名扫罗的后裔, 亚哈斯的儿子. 亚哈斯是米迦的儿子, 米非波设的孙子 (代上 9:42)
